title: Apollo Ayurveda Neem Capsules Premium Herbal Supplement - Support Healthy Skin - 60 Capsules
cleaned_text: Descripción Apollo Ayurveda Neem is a dietary supplement made from natural ingredients that may help improve skin health. Recommended to take 1 capsule, twice a day, preferably after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare provider. May take time to show results, but it is recommended to consume regularly for better results. Not intended to cure any conditions Consult to understand the dosage before consuming.
